Reviews.Title: “Don't believe everyting you read about the reviews.”
Reviews.Author: jbar21
Reviews.Content: We checked in for 4 nights. A family of 4. Got a room on the 5th floor. The front desk contrary to everyones complains is very friendly, and so is the cleaning staff. The room is nice and clean. Is it spotless and brand new? No but its very nice for the $. We have Stayed at other hotels right here in ocmd. For a lot more $ there weren't as nice. Again don't believe everything you read. The front desk guy that everyone talks bad about is just a regular guy. If you want a sparkling clean, spotless and state of the art room go stay at the Hilton ;) AND.....I am using my phone right here in my room via wifi ;) I plan on coming back.

Reviews.Title: “DIRTY, FILTHY, NASTY HOTEL...PLEASE INVEST IN CLEANING.”
Reviews.Author: MANNY369
Reviews.Content: Where should I start? I stayed at this hotel since it opened and I never had a problem here. The last three years I haven't been to Ocean City MD but I decided to returned and book to stay at this Hotel for seven days. The seven days i was there My room was never cleaned. I called the front desk and I was told by the Owner that the rooms were only cleaned every three days. I wasn't ever brought toilet paper, clean towels, and my room wasn't ever vacummed. My beds weren't made and sheets wheren't ever changed, YUK!!!! Everyday i had to go to the front desk and ask for Clean towels and toilet paper. The person who identified himself as the owner must live there because he works day and night at the front desk. All he knows how to do is make up excuses for his staff not cleaning. I asked if the pool was ever cleaned and i was told it is cleaned daily. REALLY!!!! I checked three times a day and it was the dirtest pool i ever seen in my life. Bugs on top of the water, sand that looks like it was poured by buckets. Dirty Dirty Dirty. Ohh and the pool out coach was a night mare with stains all over. One thing i can say is that neither me or my family would ever stay inside of this dump again!!!!!!! Believe me I am not a high class person who complains about anything but this place is a dump!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Just below average”
Reviews.Author: Famwidkidz
Reviews.Content: This is a beach hotel pure and simple. The room was an ok size, two beds, large refrig with microwave. It was not noisy. It has a pool that has a roof but the pool was full of sand -- kids did not mind at all. The ocean view was between two buildings so you had to squint to see it. The problem we found was that no one ever vacuumed the hall ways. For 4 days we walked thru the same filth to get to our room. In addition, the last occupant's trash was sill in our room when we arrived, but they quickly took care of that. We paid 150 per night for 4 days. Overall a good price, but they could put some more money into this property, dedicate more time to overseeing housekeeping, and it would meet expectations .

Reviews.Title: “Needs updating”
Reviews.Author: danigirl2616
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed here for one night and overall I had a clean room. However, this hotel definitely needs to be updated. The style is a little 1980s. Our unit had a musty smell to it (as did the hallways) and the couch was stained. It took us awhile to figure out what floor the pool was on. But overall it was clean and half a block from the beach, which was a plus.

Reviews.Title: “Disapointing”
Reviews.Author: Laura W
Reviews.Content: We were really considering staying in this hotel to our upcoming visit to Maryland, we were debating between this hotel and another (other one better price and other additions). I noticed that at this Hotel a week prior to our scheduled visit, they had the rooms $20 cheaper per day. I called and asked if it was possible if we could get the $20 discount per day since they were the exact days expect a week difference. The person on the other phone just quickly said "NO" and I went on explainting to him that we were considering another hotel as well and if we could get a discount here we would make our reservation right there and then and with no thought, he said "NO". So I asked if this was the manager to whom I was speaking to and to my surprised it was. I understand that sometime hotels can't make any discounts or adjustments, but just the attitude he replied to me with said to me bluntly, "I don't care for your business" when there's other ways to approach with a good attitude. We really were wanting to stay here, but his attitude just said to us that we wouldn't be able to count on the manager of the hotel if there was to go something wrong during our stay. We hadn't even reserved our stay there and the Manager was already not good to deal with at all! Not customer friendly!

Reviews.Title: “Please Clean!”
Reviews.Author: Angela R
Reviews.Content: The walls were dirty; I refused to sleep on the foldout sofabed since the mattress was stained with large brown and yellow spots, and was flat in various areas. I had to exchange "clean" towels since they had light brown hairs and small holes in them. Couldn't wait to leave. This was the first time that I had such an experience in a hotel. Definitely not worth the 200 per night. I would have had the same experience if I had stayed at a cheap motel, but would have saved significantly.

Reviews.Title: “Great room but....”
Reviews.Author: LatishaMB
Reviews.Content: The room is great!big bathroom big beds nice kitchen..balcony was good especially our top 5th floor..bad part was it rained 2 days out of our 6day stay but pool was disgusting.people came right from the sand to wash off in pool..the hallways& elevator was muggy & had a smell...maids were very nice & on their jobs! I would recommend this hotel if pool was clean !!!

Reviews.Title: “.its the beach you are going 2.”
Reviews.Author: Lisa E
Reviews.Content: I had a wonderful time and i am going again this year for the basketball event, love this hotel lisa esbrand fink

Reviews.Title: “Decent”
Reviews.Author: Leah1104
Reviews.Content: My parents and I stayed here for a weekend in March 2012. Prior to coming, I read reviews on this hotel and was nervous to arrive; however, things were decent overall. Positives: -clean room -new and fairly comfortable mattresses -decent sized balcony -spacious room -nice kitchenette: full sized fridge, microwave, cabinets, and sink. *bring your own plastic silverware though* -plenty of drawer space -close to the beach/nice location -fair price (for this time of year) -there is a sundeck, which would be really cool if it were summertime. Negatives: -indoor pool was closed! that's one of the main reasons why we booked this place. they did not tell us the pool was closed when we called and made our reservations. this could have been extremely disappointing if we had a child with us. -lobby and elevator smelled very unpleasant -no heat or exhaust fan in the bathroom -man at the front desk was unprofessional. it took about 15-20 minutes to check us in. -TV was not flat screen -only one parking space per party -heat/ac vent was very loud

Reviews.Title: “Don't Go!”
Reviews.Author: Lauren K
Reviews.Content: The beginning of the trip was great. We checked in on a friday and paid for a week. Two days before our trip should have been over and we tried to get in our room, the key would not work. They informed us we only paid for 3 days and if we wanted to get our things out we would have to pay for another day ( even though we did from the start ) Unorganized, not a friendly staff, needs to be run better.

Reviews.Title: “Uncomfortable beds.”
Reviews.Author: Tnikki88
Reviews.Content: Stayed here last summer with my husband & kids. Overall the hotel was a good price, nice location, close to the beach and it was clean. My only dislike was the bed were not comfortable! We were going to sat an extra night but I couldn't sleep on that bed one more night..If they get new beds I would definitely stay here agian..

Reviews.Title: “perfect for us”
Reviews.Author: sweetsophia
Reviews.Content: Stayed here last year and found the place to be perfect for me and my husband. Clean, new room with a small kitchen which was great! Close to ocean and large swimming pool and outdoor lounge area on the roof. The price was very reasonable and staff was friendly. They even let us use the pool and bathrooms and park our car there when we checked in early until the room was ready. We would stay there again and plan to on next visit.

Reviews.Title: “Just Reservations!!!!”
Reviews.Author: KarenCarter
Reviews.Content: This place just told me that they would not give us a refund we have to give them six days notice for a REFUND.. tHE MAN ON PHONE STATED THERE WAS NO ONE ELSE i COULD TALK TO !!! aTTITUDE WAS TUFF LUCK LADY!!yOU SHOULD RECONSIDER THIS ESTABLISHMENT !!!! Big rip off!......Most respectable hotels refund policy is 24 hours... My true thoughts are they are taking advantage of the younger generation, and from all the other reviews here they will never get my business again...

Reviews.Title: “Nice beach hotel, spacious rooms and efficiency kitchen”
Reviews.Author: emilysmom2003
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Bonita Beach and found it to be a nice, friendly place close to the ocean. The rooms on the north side of the hotel have balcony views of both the beach and the bay; the rooms on the south side have a view of the parking lot. The balconies on the fifth floor have no roof to keep the rain off. Luckily we were on the north side, fourth floor, so had a nice view from the covered balcony during the rainy weekend. The room had two queen-sized beds, a convertible sofa, a full-sized fridge, microwave, coffee maker, sink and a few dishes. The bathroom had no fan, but did have a hair dryer. The rooms were not very soundproof, so we could hear traffic on Coastal Highway and noisy people in the halls. The free wifi worked only in the small hotel lobby. The indoor pool had plenty of pool towels. Parking is in a covered lot, very handy for unloading and loading your car in the rain. It's a very convenient location, with a bus stop right outside the door and a doughnut shop across the street. The beach is about a block away and you do not have to cross any streets between the hotel and beach. There is a lifeguard stand and a place to rent beach umbrellas right on the beach. The management was very responsive; when the coffee maker did not work, the manager sent up a brand new one in a box. You do have to ask for coffee filter packs at the front desk. Extra towels were gladly delivered.

Reviews.Title: “Meat and potatos hotel.”
Reviews.Author: HRRtraveler
Reviews.Content: Newly renovated circa 1990! Bring lysol and own blanket. Where they towels or rags? I'm a blond those before me were'nt and they shed. Place is average. Close to beach. Ok balcony.

Reviews.Title: “WHAT'S THE FUSS?”
Reviews.Author: harleyII
Reviews.Content: Mf BFF And I stayed in room 501 at BONITA BEACH HOTEL for a girls weekend. We were welcomed with smiles when we arrived by the staff at the fron desk and our check in took 5 minutes. After receiving our keys, we went into our room and it was clean and bright. I was confused about the negative reviews this hotel recieved. We recieved the best room in the whole place. Our room was an end unit , top floor closest to the beach. whata view! We had a view of the ocean and the bay. We were steps to the ocean. There was a microwave and fridge. There was also an ironing board and iron in the room. We vistied the pool which also had sliders to the sun deck which overlooked the street. 2 bathroom conviently located to the pool. We never moved our car once we arrived. Conviently located to restaurants and pubs. I don't know what the fuss was aobut. Our room was awesome. If you compalin about sand in the ppo, perhaps patrons should utilize the heated showers located outside the buildin prior to using it. if you complain about the wall paper peeling, perhaps patrons should not pull on it. if you complain about dirt on thte walls, perhpas patrons should ensure their children are not thorowing objects at them. If you are complaining about noisey patrons having fun in the hallway on their vacation, get a life.

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Hotel”
Reviews.Author: jcrow1060
Reviews.Content: Room was incredibly clean , very attentive staff. Wi-fi didn't work no matter what area of the building we tried to get connection. We initially had some ac issues but management was very eager to stay on top of the problem and eventually it was resolved. Pool was just ok small needs to be updated and it would be nice to have had an outdoor pool. Its a very nice hotel and we would definitely stay there again. It is located in a great area with many excellent restaurants and things to do. We had a spectacular side view of the ocean from our room. Balcony was so nice to sit on an an relax while overlooking the ocean and the city.

Reviews.Title: “A great value for ocean city”
Reviews.Author: beachgoingfamof5
Reviews.Content: Bonita Beach Hotel was very nice for our family. We enjoyed the view of the ocean and the bay. The pool was nice for rainy days and the sundeck was also a nice touch. The room was clean and the cleaning staff were prompt with their service. My only gripe is that they should provide a broom and dust pan in each room for leftover sand from the beach. Many other rooms we have stayed in at beaches have had brooms. Overall for the money, you can't get much better. would definately stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Average place close to the beach”
Reviews.Author: porjotok_Boston
Reviews.Content: This place is nothing fancy, but it's fairly close to the beach. There were six of us and we fit easily with two queen beds and the full sleeper sofa. The room was clean, but a little dated. The room came with a fridge, microwave, and cups, which were very convenient. We asked for extra towels which were delivered promptly. Staff was very friendly. There's an indoor pool, but it's quite small and the floor is worn out. It was also quite busy with kids.

Reviews.Title: “Good place for the money”
Reviews.Author: Piragua
Reviews.Content: Rooms was on 5th floor clean and cleaning staff good , indoor pool a plus on bad weather and kid friendly guys at maintenance and lobby were good young lady needs customer service traiining or start taking friendly pills, less than a block from beach , microwave and refrigerator in good condition always make reservation using their web site not 3rd party better results

Reviews.Title: “We'll be back”
Reviews.Author: sas12715
Reviews.Content: This was our second year to stay at Bonita Beach. Our family had 3 rooms and we all were pleased! It's great! Rooms are large & clean & staff is very helpful. We could see both the ocean and the bay from our room. Can't figure out the bad reviews! People expect too much. Good location with restaurants and beach close by. Nice sundeck! We'll definitely return next year!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice time, beautiful location to the beach, clean rooms, friendly and helpful staff.”
Reviews.Author: pmc3mom
Reviews.Content: We were originally staying 5 nights, and had such a wonderful time, that we stayed an additional night. This is our first time staying at a hotel, we usually stay in a condo. The rooms are large, clean and comfortable; beds included! Very quiet, no noise from the street or the neighbors next door. Front desk staff were resourceful and friendly. Cleaning lady was also warm and friendly. The owner was on site most of our stay and was very interesting and informative. Will be back for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Would definitely stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: nillawafa
Reviews.Content: I am really surprised by the bad reviews. When reviewing the hotel I wish people would remember this is not a corporate managed four star Marriott or Hilton hotel. If that is what you are looking for than go pay $300 a night and stay somewhere else. My four girlfriends and I stayed in a room with two queen beds and a pull out coach. We stayed in room #219 which had an excellent view of the bay and ocean. We loved having the kitchenette to prepare small meals to help cut down on costs. There is an interesting lounge area right off the elevator but it came in handy for the friends who wanted to stay up late and hang out while the rest of us slept. We had no problems checking in. The gentleman even let my family check-in early. We also loved the location it's right across the street from Dunkin Donuts for morning breakfast and coffee. There are also two great places across the street open until 4am for the late night snack. I found the place to be very clean and whenever we needed new towels the cleaning lady brought them right away. The pool is nothing to write home about but I did enjoy the fact that it was indoor in case there is a storm (which we did have) and a large sun deck for tanning.

Reviews.Title: “Never, ever stay here”
Reviews.Author: FreqTraveler830
Reviews.Content: We thought family-owned would host more individualized, friendlier hospitality but at this hotel there is an arrogance that is put forth that you are lucky they are renting you a room. It took over 2 hrs to check-in. The 1st room had been used, so we requested a clean room. The 2nd room, we were given a key, opened the door and it was occupied. Needless to say, the lack of security was a major concern. When asked to get our deposit back we were told to wait for the owner/manager, who didn't show up for over an hour because he was kicking out the people in the 2nd room. We were never given our deposit, but only the choice to use a dirty room. In this instance, family-owned means that the hotel is not required to live up to any standards other than the owner's whim. While waiting, we were exposed to 5 or 6 guests complaining about no lights working in the rooms, the telephone not working, dirty bathrooms, etc. with their room assignments. The owner/manager has no sense of responsibility, only one of money!!! The swimming pool was so dirty, we would not swim in it. DO NOT STAY AT THIS HOTEL - YOU WILL BE DISAPPOINTED!!!!

Reviews.Title: “It was okay!”
Reviews.Author: eyesofsinister
Reviews.Content: We came here for memorial day weekend. The Good: The hotel was pretty clean and had a nice, but small lobby. The beds are comfy and a nice little deck out side of the room. Free parking, but only to hotel guest, which is good. The location is good for those that don't want to be on the boardwalk and the beach is right behind the hotel. Bus stop to the boardwalk is about a block away and plenty of thing to walk to like stores, spas, and restaurants. The bad: The staff is not friendly at all. I believe this hotel may be family owned. Rude 16 years old girls at the front dest and the older woman was not that inviting herself. They didn't seem as if they even wanted to help. The elevator shook everytime we got on it. Like I said the rooms were fine, but the walls are paper think. Could her the TV blasting on our left and a couple having sex on our right. The couple heard my friends and I laugh and they stopped. This hotel is far from soundproof. Would I stay here again... nah I'd probably try something eles.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: stecat102
Reviews.Content: We keep coming back. This is our fourth year. We love the location. Convenient to the beach. The hotel is clean. The service is excellent. Trust me, stay here.

Reviews.Title: “No negative review here”
Reviews.Author: TyTracey
Reviews.Content: We are here right now and I am not sure why other visitors have given this hotel negative reviews. The owner has been very nice to us since we walked thru the front doors. Maid service is super! Rooms are clean and the place is well maintained. As for the pictures on the site they look just like that in person. Yes, there is a little wear and tear but that is to be expected given how many guests stay here and how a lot of people do not take care of things that do not belong to them. No fault on the owners of the hotel. I am also typing this with their wifi connection. :) We are already talking about coming back here and staying next year!!! Do not believe all the negative reviews. For the price and the value it is a nice hotel to stay in and enjoy your vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Check the going room rate carefully!”
Reviews.Author: Canomom
Reviews.Content: Check what the going rate is for the room when checking in if you booked in advance. The going rate was $20 cheaper per night for our stay. The management would not give us the lower rate. Also, if wifi is necessary, be careful, the signal does not reach all rooms. We had to change rooms once we had unpacked. I called ahead to make sure wifi was available there and was assured there would not be a problem - there was. Otherwise, clean, a little outdated, and spacious rooms. Great location though. Lots of parking although larger vehicles might have problems getting in and out. Would recommend but check rates.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed Our Stay”
Reviews.Author: Shortcake079
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed the hotel, I was nervous after reading some of the reviews the only negative I will say is that the staff is not to friendly at the front desk other than that we had a good time. It was eight of us we had two rooms, the pool is open all night so after we had a ball in the room we went to the pool around 1am in the morning. We had a wonderful view of the beach. We was not to far from the boardwalk we just had to get on the bus outside $2.00 for all day and it is a straight shot. I would stay there again for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Worst place to stay ever”
Reviews.Author: xaya18
Reviews.Content: I've been down to Ocean City many times and stayed at many hotels and this was one of the worst places i have ever stayed at. The service was terrible. The manger/owner was so rude and nasty. He was uncompromising. He threaten to call the cops on us because we had one guest over during the daytime. This hotel had cameras all over the place. There was absolutely no privacy. We got into an argument with the manger/owner and felt uncomfortable staying at a place with no privacy so we left and lost our first night deposit. I would rate this place below zero if i could. The room was not clean. The bathroom was dirty and the service was just horrible. PLEASE DON'T STAY HERE! I'm sure you will regret it too.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed the Bonita Beach Hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: skimberly8399
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were going to OC for a vacation. We really liked this hotel and would stay there again. The hotel was clean and the rooms are a good size. We could see the beach from our balcony. The hotel is very close to the beach and everything else. The only negative things to our stay was that the beds are not so comfy and the grounds of the hotel could use some clean up. But then again as I looked around OC I think the whole town could use some better trash clean up.

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT GO HERE >DIRTY & RUDE STAFF ~GO SOMEWHERE ELSE!!!!”
Reviews.Author: ALIA247
Reviews.Content: Staff is sooooo Rude beyond belief but they will also try to bleed you out of every extra dollar possible! We were not even 15 minutes late in checking out and they charged us $125.oo.. Not until the SECOND day of asking for towels & room service did i see someone..after which of course the staff had a very serious attitude.I can not recall NOT ONCE hearing a vaccum cleaner EVER.. Not even in the Hallways. FINALLY someone banged on the door to just drop of towels. >no vaccum >no wipe down. NOTHING!! There is sand everywhere... including inside the pool,of which that entire area is VERY DIRTY (looks NOTHING like the picture..BEWARE!!)..>too much chlorine >bathrooms had no toliet paper >never cleaned the entire 5 days we were there..UNFOURTUNETLY!! You feel like your constantly being spYied on w/ the way all the cameras are turned(you will notice @ the front desk) VERY CREEPY!! I could go on and on..... Never came in contact with a ruder staff in my life.... ever!!! WISH WE NEVER WENT HERE!! :(

Reviews.Title: “not bad for OC”
Reviews.Author: TravelSalesMan
Reviews.Content: Most hotels in OC cram E1 in 3-4 months to make up for the slow season. Rates jump, etc etc etc. Renovations are few are far between for most properties. This place however has done a good job keeping up appearances. It a nice sized room for a family with a pull out sofa as well. There is a full sized refrigerator, but no cook top sadly. Nice location in town, and price is competitive.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect stay!!”
Reviews.Author: blueeyedgirl8885
Reviews.Content: After searching online and reading reviews for tons of hotels in OC we finally ran out of time & patience and settled on Bonita Beach. The place was perfect. I honestly could say nothing bad about it. Clean is the most important to us followed by closeness to the beach and price. This was very clean and short walk to the beach and reasonably priced. We stayed in room 322 which included a kinda seperate living room space that had a couch that was also a pull out bed if needed, table to sit and eat and coffee table and a comfy chair too. The bed was king and extremely comfortable. Bathroom was good size and clean and the kitchen was very nice and came with a full size refrigerator, microwave, sink (and soap and towel) and had a few plates, cups and silverware too! The balcony had a side view of the ocean which was like 1/2 block away and to the other side you could see the bay in the distance. The pool was clean and also had its own shower area and bathrooms and nice size rooftop lounging area with many chairs. Check in wasn't until 3 but we got there at 12:00 and they let us use the pool and shower area while waiting for check in. Restaurants & shopping were across the street and the bus stop in front of hotel too. BEST part was the price...compared to some hotels we saw this one was way more reasonable. Would love to stay here again and would recommend this to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Rude,Rude, Rude!!”
Reviews.Author: guinness1969
Reviews.Content: The place is run down. The rooms are dirty and you have to ask to get your bed made, fresh towels, and toilet paper. The air conditioners barely work(they say they are having electrical problems). They make you pay for your entire stay up front and are the rudest most incompetant staff we have ever had contact with. We would have been more comfortable sleeping in our car.

Reviews.Title: “Really...don't do it!”
Reviews.Author: loupipe
Reviews.Content: Just returned from our vacation to OCMD. We got bumped from our first choice hotel and decided to take a chance on this hotel. After reading the reviews, I was hesitant, but thought we could stay anywhere for only three nights. Well, we stayed, but it was not in any way a relaxing get away! BELIEVE the reviews - it is certainly not a family hotel in any way. Each floor has a lobby area, which to me, invites people to gather. Not a bad thing, unless your room happens to be off the lobby area; which ours was. Why they would ever put a family with young children and an older person here, I cannot understand. I had to ask a group of adults to be quiet the first night (this was at MIDNIGHT). They were camped out around the lobby -literally with camp chairs set up - playing cards and drinking. They had the courtesy to leave when I complained, but they were then replaced with a group of tweens just screaming and running around. Translation: Mom and Dad didn't want them in their room so they sent them to the "lobby." After asking them twice to quiet down, we had to call the front desk. They did immediately address the issue, but in the morning I noticed the lobby area was open to the downstairs front desk, plus they have cameras everyone, so they clearly knew what was going on and chose to ignore it until I called. When we asked to be moved to a quieter area we were told they were full. Also, there is a young boy working the front desk - not sure why a child that looks about 12 is working, but he was there almost the entire time we were. It seems odd to complain to a child. The older lady everyone mentioned was also there - she was ok; but no one is at all friendly. Again, to those with family, don't do it. If you're there to party, you'll be ok. Almost forgot - the indoor pool area is filthy. Full of sand, and there was actually a pigeon roosting above our heads when we laid back in the chaise. The pool was way over chlorinated as well.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel. Would definitely stay again!!”
Reviews.Author: sanntay
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure what to expect given the mixed reviews, but I was pleasantly surprised. This hotel is very clean and the rooms are spacious. The views are great, and you are steps away from the beach. The beds are comfortable, and the kitchenette is a great bonus. The only complaints I would issue would be a mildew smell in the bathroom, no sound on the HBO channel, very tight parking spaces, and the rude woman at the desk when I checked out. I would stay here again in a heartbeat, though.

Reviews.Title: “Bonita Beach Hotel was better than I expected compared to other hotels I researched in Ocean City”
Reviews.Author: Locs06
Reviews.Content: Bonita Beach was a very clean hotel and the location is perfect. I was traveling with my husband and two kids. The hotel is literally two steps to the beach and located near several restuarants. The bus stop is directly across the street which is only $2 per person to ride all day. The bus is a straight right to the boardwalk. My children 8 and 14 really enjoyed the hotel being so close to beach. The hotel is a little far from the board walk but the bus ride is only 15 minutes. My family enjoyed being away from the board walk noise. The beach on this end is very quiet and relaxing. I will visit Ocean City, Maryland next year and stay at Bonita Beach Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Coming Back”
Reviews.Author: hollywood561
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this hotel to anyone on a budget looking to stay in Uptown OCMD the room was clean, well stocked and most of all beautiful view of ocean and bay, request Northside Room they have the better views.

Reviews.Title: “Definitely WOULD stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: Baltobchgrl
Reviews.Content: I have no complaints about this hotel! Location is great, close to beach. The hotel staff was accomodating and friendly. We had no reason to contact the desk since everything met our standards. The hotel was Clean, as was our room! Not sure what everyone else is complaining about, but we felt this hotel was a good value, clean and would recommend it to friends. We had a king suite with a full size refrigerator and plenty of room. One suggestion is to get coffee for the in room coffee pot at the desk before the am. It wasn't stored in the room.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Stay at Bonita Beach Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ShirleyNVa
Reviews.Content: Based on mixed reviews, I was a bit apprehensive about reserving a 5 night stay here, but the special offered - stay 4 nights, get 5th night free, was attractive, and made the cost about 120.00 per night. The room was fairly clean, the people we dealt with, both at the front desk and cleaning crew, were all pleasant. We enjoyed the views from the balcony. Had no trouble with anything except I was not able to get WiFi from the room on the 4th floor. Had to go to the lobby area on the 2nd floor to pick it up with my netbook.

Reviews.Title: “Rudest staff at a hotel in Ocean City”
Reviews.Author: beachbabe710
Reviews.Content: We had made a reservation for one night in this hotel to stay and when we got there the extremely rude woman at the front desk told us that we did not have a reservation made. But, they did have my friend's (who made the reservation) phone number and email address, so obviously they made a mistake in our reservation. We had to put a security deposit of $200 to get a handicapped room with one king bed for 4 adults. We were going to take it because it was Memorial Day weekend on Saturday and we needed a place to stay. The woman got angry with us and refunded our money and told us we couldn't have the room, so we were out of a hotel in Ocean City on Memorial Day weekend... Spent hours looking for somewhere else that would let us stay for just one night. Definitely wouldn't recommend this hotel to anyone I know. Based on the previous reviews, I'd say this hotel does not appreciate younger people in their rooms, and make their trips to the Ocean stressful.

Reviews.Title: “What a wonderful stay!”
Reviews.Author: our3beachgirls
Reviews.Content: We loved this place! The beds were comfy, the bathroom was clean and very well stocked and the room was generally clean. We had a full size refridge. Coffeemaker. Towels at the drop of a hat! Service was excellent! Staff was superb! Friendly, including the puppy, which by the way, our girls just adored! Indoor pool was awesome with adjoining outdoor sundeck. Overall it was a very pleasant stay. Very QUIET! Planning another stay here this year!

Reviews.Title: “Daughter's 16th Birthday weekend at the beach.”
Reviews.Author: lovethebeachforever
Reviews.Content: My daughter wanted to go to Ocean City for her 16th birthday with friends. I booked two rooms--one king and one with two queen beds. When I made the reservation, I requested rooms on the same floor as the pool and adjorning rooms. I was accomodated with both requests at check in. Both rooms were very clean and the staff friendly. The indoor pool was also nice in October. The king room was very roomy. I would recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice”
Reviews.Author: lbk72007
Reviews.Content: I had read all the reviews but booked anyway, there wasn't much to chose from being it was bike week so I took a chance. I was a little afraid of what I was getting myself into from all the other reviews. But it was very very nice! Very clean, spacious, and just pretty. Our room had 2 queen beds and a pull out sofa. The bathroom was pretty big and very clean. There is only an indoor pool not an outdoor but there is a sundeck next to the indoor one. I have no complaints about staying here and def would again. Im not quite sure why the other reviews were so bad but it was one of the best places I've stayed in ocean city and I'm a clean freak so I don't stay in dirty places. Very very nice!

Reviews.Title: “The Hotel gave our room away..”
Reviews.Author: socr0930
Reviews.Content: I had made a reservation for the weekend of the 26th-28th and the person who booked the hotel room mistakenly booked it for the weekend of the 19th. When we didn't show ....since that wasn't the weekend we had reserved the room for...they cancelled the reservation. The next weekend when we went to check in they didn't have any rooms left and were out on the street. We had to drive around until late at night to find a hotel with vacancy, and then had to find another hotel for the next night. There is even a note on my account saying that the employee had made the reservation for the wrong weekend, and the man working at the front desk the night we tried to check in admitted that the hotel must have made a mistake. Will Never consider this hotel again....and you shouldn't either.

Reviews.Title: “would NOT recommend & will not stay here again”
Reviews.Author: momtohalfdozen
Reviews.Content: Beds have extremely worn mattresses, sheets were dirty, toilet rim was black, and sleeper sofa sank two feet! The beds were so uncomfortable we left one day early and lost $200.00. They make you pay for entire stay up front and don't allow you to cancel even if unhappy. I would NOT recommend this to families especially with young children.

Reviews.Title: “Better than anticipated”
Reviews.Author: beachtraveller5
Reviews.Content: Based on the mixed reviews, I was not sure what to expect. This is not a fancy hotel. However, it's quiet, very close to the beach, and has plenty of restaurants and shops within walking distance. The boardwalk is about a 10 minute drive. The kids enjoyed the pool. My husband appreciated the free wireless connectivity. Price was good ($155/night) for a family of 5 and the room was spacious with 2 queens and a pull-out couch. Beds were comfortable and the room was clean. We had a partial view of the ocean which required leaning over the balcony and looking to the left. The front desk was a little gruff, but most requests were satisfied. Only negative was that we had requested adjoining rooms with another family at time of reservation. Upon check-in the adjoining rooms were not available. They neglected to tell us that securing adjoining rooms required that we book the two rooms on the same credit card. However, they put us side by side and we were able to talk across the balconies (yes they are that close). I would definitely go back again for a budget-conscious vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Feel Like a Number”
Reviews.Author: indyjim1969
Reviews.Content: We also stayed here because of our daughters dance competition in town. When we called and wanted to come in one day early, that was no problem, but when we found out our dance schedule finished one day earlier than expected, we were told sorry, policy did not allow early cancellations, so we paid one full day extra as we drove back to Michigan. That is fair enough, policy is policy. But when toward the end of our stay we got a call from our bank about overdrafts, and we found out why, we were very upset. I had put my deposit on my debit card, which was a charge for the first night of the stay. When I checked in, they took an imprint of that card but I prepaid the rest of our stay on my Visa Card. They assured me they were just taking an imprint of my debit card. They did charge my Visa $811 for the balance, but they also charged me that same amount on my debit card. The desk said that they realized that right away and issued a credit, but the bank of course placed a hold on that amount for 7 days. No one bothered to tell us, except our bank when some overdrafts hit. Even after this, they were not willing to at least waive half of the final day room cost. The location itself we liked. It is on the beach side of the road, which is a big plus. The walk to the beach was no more than 2 or 3 minutes, and there was a nice water spicket/shower on the side of the hotel as you came back that you could use to get sand off of you. Our room's balcony had a nice view of the ocean on one side and the bay on the other. The room itself was nice, maybe a bit worn but the wear and tear on these rooms must be high, The indoor pool was pretty murky, we only used it once. There was a nice sun deck that adjoined it. Next time we will find a different hotel, life is just too short to come back to a place where customer service and making the customer happy just really isn't a concern.

Reviews.Title: “dirty not friendly rude rude rude dirty”
Reviews.Author: nainas4kids
Reviews.Content: i feel like i am having de ja vu reading the last review they did the same exact to my family, telling me how old my daugther is my daugther is 10 and the front desk kept calling my room asking how old she was. i checked out the next day i wasnt even there for 24 hours and they charged me 500 dollars. i was so upset i had to find another place to stay and i was with 4 kids under the age of 10 i do not reccomend this hotel to anyone. they have a dog running around the lobby which i am extremely allergic to, the drawers were all broken in the room my clothes i kept in my suitcase the bed linens were filthy when we asked for more towels they said you will get them tommorow they were extremely rude they made my daugther cry if i could have put a sign outside and tell people not to come in i would . they started to ruin my vacation and i missed my daugther dancing because i had to check out. whoever george is he is extremely rude and should probably get another job hopefuly not working with people. they also moniter everything you do. when i am on vacation i dont like having people knowing when i am going to the bathroom. stay away from the bonita beach hotel anyplace is better than here if i rented a tent on the beach and used a port o potty it would have been nicer and cleaner.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel! A+!”
Reviews.Author: summermaui
Reviews.Content: Just returned home from a stay at the Bonita Beach hotel. Everything was fantastic, and for the price I was extremely pleased. I have stayed in my share of dives and delights in OCMD, and this was definitely a delight! A+, will return ASAP!

Reviews.Title: “Stay away unless you like to be insulted!!!”
Reviews.Author: trak100
Reviews.Content: I made reservations with this hotel for my daughter's dance competition. We were orginally scheduled to stay at the Comfort Suites but later changed because we were able to stay at this hotel. We had stay at this hotel in the past and really enjoyed our stay and was looking forward to it again. I had even recommended this hotel to the studio that we belong to of almost 100 members. This time however was completely different. Not sure if managment has changed since the last time that I was there. The front desk staff is very rude after she asked my 14 year old niece how many were staying in our room and she would have to charge us to two additonal adults. When I came down to see what was going on she was very rude and said I sign paperwork stating that children older than 10 are considered adults but never gave a copy of the paperwork that points that out nor do they stress that at the time of check-in or if you make reservations on the phone. I was so angry at they way the owner stood in the lobby and allow his employee to speak to me that I check out that day. My niece was so upset she thought that she had ruined our vacation simply because she wanted to come at the last minute to celebrate her birthday!!!! The housekeeping is another reason to stay away. We received wash linens that were dingy and some still had makeup on them from pervious users one day we just used our own towels instead! I agree with some of the other writers that the cleaning services comes very late and there is water damage throughout the hotel. Also people who clearly do not stay at the hotel park in the spaces which are reserved for guest and walk over to the beach. Several years ago there were parking passes now there is none. Will never go back and neither will my studio! Too bad Bonita!

Reviews.Title: “Relieved...Great Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: roses4rachx3
Reviews.Content: I was worried from reading some of the other reviews but was so relieved that the hotel was very nice. Sometimes pictures are decieving but it looked like what the pictures did. The staff was very friendly and the hotel was very clean. The rooms were nice and spacious. The only thing I did not like was that a cleaning person came in the room to make the bed and straighten up the bathroom when I had the "Privacy Please" sign on the door. My wallet, purse, and personal belongings were in the room. If I had known what time they clean the rooms I would have taken my wallet. If I wanted the rooms to be cleaned I would have turned the sign over to the "Service Please" side. Nothing was missing luckily but overall the hotel was good.

Reviews.Title: “We love this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: elfs
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel, especially for the price. We didn't think we had any view, being ocean block, but had a corner room with a nice view of the ocean, and even a little of the bay. The hotel was very clean, and has a very nice indoor pool, great for the kids. The rooms are very spacious, and it was a quiet, friendly hotel. We will stay again!

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: vrdNewYork
Reviews.Content: _ dirty sheets( make up from the previous person) _obnoxious teenagers running around and fist fighting in the middle of the night _No ocean view (none at ALL no matter what they say) _ Front desk and cleaning staff horrible manners _No amenities ( if it is raining there is no adult relaxation, no hot tub) _ Rooms were not cleaned until 3:00 in the afternoon everyday. On the one rainy day they came at 12 and we were still in the room . When I asked them to come back in 1/2 hour I was told now or never. OC in general: Coming from New York the food in Ocean City altogether is just disappointing. We left a day earlier then planned due to the combination in a horrible hotel and bad food.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place”
Reviews.Author: lamia321
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 3 days in July-peak season. This is just a nice, quiet family run place. Our room was on the second floor & looked brand new & cleanliness was never a concern. The lobby on our floor did seem kind of hot & stuffy but we were just passing through not sleeping there.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible Service”
Reviews.Author: Eclass215
Reviews.Content: The hotel itself was ok - but the service from the front desk lady was outrageous!! I booked the trip online and she would not recognize the price that was confirmed online. We disputed the price even though I showed her my confirmation directly from the website. I am still in dispute because I want to be refunded the difference. If it wasn't memorial day weekend, I would have said forget it and tried to book another hotel, but vacancies were few and far between. I will never go back and do not recommend staying there. They don't know how to treat customers.

Reviews.Title: “Will never go back!”
Reviews.Author: MsAlicia
Reviews.Content: The hotel itself was fine but the service is why we will never return! Checking-in became an hour long ordeal. I was very disappointed and it was not worth the trouble at all. Save yourself time and money.

Reviews.Title: “girls getaway”
Reviews.Author: chrissyp0303
Reviews.Content: My best friend and I went down to OC last weekend. We are both 30 years old and I am a nurse. After reading the reviews, I was hesitant about staying here. We decided to give it a try and were pleasantly surprised. The front desk was very accomodating and allowed us to check in three hours early. I did my bedbug check with the matresses and there were none. The room was spacious, the shower had great HOT water and the view was fabulous for what we payed. The pool was clean and there were NO kids. The lobby onb the thrid floor was bright and cheerful. We learned to not always follow the negative reviews. Our glass is always half full....

Reviews.Title: “Never made it to the Bonita and dissappointed with their service.”
Reviews.Author: amconcierge
Reviews.Content: I just called the Bonita to change my reservation from Friday and Saturday to just Saturday. The lady abrublty told me that because I was going from two nights to one that my rate for the one night would have to increase. I don't believe it. It's not even peak season yet! So I just cancel the reservation. My girlfriend and I planned a simple quick getaway to OC. Nothing complicated. I refused to paid an extra $20 for a room just because we are unable to stay two nights. We will take our chance and just drive around to hotels/motels once we get there. Your lost Bonita Beach.

Reviews.Title: “Ended up at doctors after staying here - uncleanliness!”
Reviews.Author: ADCPennsylvania
Reviews.Content: Booked at this hotel because of the great room rates and description. Three out of the four of us staying at this hotel ended up with a rash from bed bugs/dust mites. Had to go to the doctors for treatment. The room was dirty and the beds and linens were also not clean. This hotel needs to be inspected and steps should be taken to renovate the hotel rooms with new beds, bed linens, etc. and get new management and maid service that will actually take care of seeing that these problems do not occur again! This was a horrible experience for me and my family!

Reviews.Title: “Bonita Boneeda Cleaning Crew”
Reviews.Author: JKontheroad
Reviews.Content: The Price was right, the DRAWINGS looked good, we could use an efficiency, the location was ok, the reviews were meh. So we booked for our last 3 days in OC this summer. My spouse's boss was nice enough to let us stay at his North Bethany beach house for the first 2 days otherwise we would have rented a condo. First off...don't let the Bonita's drawings on their website confuse you, this is a motel. The lobby is depicted to be large, it is tiny. The "atrium" looks big, it is really just a shaft that goes up between floors, and on the lowest level is filled with a couple of couches and fake palms. The pool was ok, but full of sand, and the view was a sliver of ocean, while dodging cigarette butts, and trash thrown from other balconies. The front desk staff unprofessional, their ethic seemed "family" and not in the good way. They had a dog behind the counter, and respond with just a minute when it was obvious that they were doing nothing more important than surfing the web or emailing. The "gentleman" behind the desk thought I would enjoy an off color comment about a guest who inquired about the hours of the dunkin donuts across the street "Not needing any donuts" and proceeded to enlighten me about his own weight loss. Yeah ok... This hotel uses immigrant kids (teen and early 20's) from former block countries and Russia, they are nice kids, but not great cleaners. Our bathroom was spot cleaned not fully cleaned. There was splatter on the wall in the open closet (across from the little kitchen) the rugs were fairly nasty throughout. The fridge was spotless. The included dishes cleanliness was suspect at best. 2 out 5 times that I left by way of the lobby the woman who worked the counter was in a heated argument with a guest about something. To top everything off, on our last night the fire alarm went off at 3am, we scooped up my 3 year old and my 7 year old was already awake and went outside awaiting the fire department. I'm a professional photographer, so I grabbed my camera (of course). The fire department came and talked to the clueless front desk night teen (maybe 20 something), and after a 40 minutes of standing outside the kid unconvincingly and without explanation told us it was "ok" to go back in. YAY!

Reviews.Title: “Not worth the money!”
Reviews.Author: MarylandRoadtripper
Reviews.Content: The hotel's website is very deceptive. The rooms are not what most travelers would consider "suites." The hotel is somewhat dirty and run down (peeling wall paper, dirty pool, leaking roof in the bathroom at the pool area, broken equipment in the exercise room), etc. There are definitely better hotels in the area that cost less money...I would not recommend this place.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: TBDPa
Reviews.Content: Rooms are huge. This is a great stay at the Beach. Newer hotel. Very clean, very nice. Will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience!”
Reviews.Author: Easygoing1402
Reviews.Content: After reading a few reviews here, I was a little concerned about booking the Bonita Beach Hotel - both because of the reviews and because it was so far away from the Boardwalk. I'm glad to report that I had nothing to fear! This hotel is clean and the room is very spacious - with a full-sized refrigerator, which comes in especially handy if you don't want to eat all of your meals out. While not ocean "front," the hotel is less than a half-block off the beach with easy access (not requiring you to cross the street). It's clean, relatively updated and has nice views of both the bay and the ocean. The owners of the hotel - who were mentioned in earlier reviews - were very pleasant and helpful. I was also especially glad that we stayed farther up on the beach and away from the boardwalk. It depends on what you're into but the boardwalk was crazy - even out of season - with t-shirt shops, food places, henna parlors, etc. - and was not someplace I'd care to go again. Instead, we were in a quieter area of the beach which is very clean and relaxing.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed with the Bonita”
Reviews.Author: diaappointed
Reviews.Content: The room looked exactly like the photo that was posted online, but the pool photo was very misleading; the pool was very small and only goes up to 4ft.,(only room for about 5 children at a time and if your're a parent that swims, too bad. Although it is very true that every room has a balcony, the balconies are too close together for any type of privacy or peace. The overall cleaniness of the room was poor. The bathroom was poorly ventilated (the vent was visibly filled with dust), and the bathroom ceiling was a too low for people over 5'5" tall (when you raise you arm, your elbow hits the ceiling), it felt as though you were taking a shower in a closet. The water pressure was a low because the shower nozzle was clogged. Housekeeping never disinfected or cleaned the toilet, sink or bathtub; it was wiped with a dry cloth. The sheets are so old and worn that they were transparent and the elastic on the fitted sheets are just shot, which made sleeping very uncomfortable, when you had to get up in the night to put the sheet back on the bed. The pillows were too soft and flat, like trying to lay your head on "a tiny" cottonball; two pillows were no better; just not a comfortable sleep. The front desk staff was bit scarce. Needless to say, I would never stay here again....very disappointed...and definitely not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: “"Pleasant Surprise at Bonita Beach!"”
Reviews.Author: mdgirl86
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews I was a little nervous about booking our stay at the Bonita Beach; however, after searching through many hotels/motels in OC that looked run down and dated I decided to take my chance. I was very surprised. Check-in seemed a bit disorganized but for the most part the staff was pleasant and inviting. I did not experience any of the stories mentioned below. Our rooms was spacious and had a full sized refridgerator! The rooms were clean and a great feature was the balcony overlooked both the bay & ocean. Overall, the Bonita is in my opinion worth it. Mid-town is a great location and the hotel overall is in much better shape than many other hotels/motels in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Unfriendly and Underhanded”
Reviews.Author: Daisy849
Reviews.Content: When we saw the web site for this page, we called as they advertised special rates. Of course, we were told it wasn't for the week we wanted to book. We needed an efficiency room and asked how many did it sleep. We were told 4 or 5 as there was a sleeper sofa. We thought it was ideal until we were called down to the front desk, aftter paying for the entire week in advance and were informed that they (without authorization)charged our credit card an additional 55.25 for our 5th family member. In addition to the fraud, they had 50 year old sheets in the room that wouldn't stay on the bed, therefore we slept on bare mattresses. The sheets were not replaced daily, the bathroom was not cleaned daily, only clean towels were replaced. The front desk people were unfriendly and downright rude. Oh yes and before I forget, the indoor pool at night smelled like a toilet from all the kids in there. The bottom was filthy. For $205 per night and the additional 55.25 for the extra, I feel we were genuinely robbed.

Reviews.Title: “A Pleasant Surprise!”
Reviews.Author: wvgodiva
Reviews.Content: After reading many of the posts on here I was prepared for a disaster. I was pleasantly surprised. The front desk woman, who is an owner, along with the older gentleman can be cranky, but the good news on our trip was that they had sent some rowdy kids and their family packing. I personally respect the fact that they lost the business of the rowdy ones, but kept people like me and my husband. I personally resent it when kids scream, yell, and run up and down the halls. We were pleasant with them, and they were pleasant with us. On another note, I felt very secure with all of the cameras that were watching the hotel and parking area. The room was clean, perhaps not spotless, but I have stayed in much worse for higher prices. I had taken disinfectant wipes and used them on the sink and toilet..which I always do anyway. The international teens that they have cleaning the room did fine for the most part, but did tend to skip a lot of the bathroom stuff. The location is great, the rooms are huge, with a very nice little kitchenette. We were able to save a lot of money (and calories) but eating sandwiches, fruit, and salads for breakfast and lunch, then splurging for a nice dinner. All in all we had a great vacation and would recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel For The Money”
Reviews.Author: sydneychase
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the hotel for 5 days with my three young children (2,4,7) Did not come across any problems with the room. Actually the room was far better than I expected. Would not hesitate to stay at Bonita again. Staff was friendly to my family and was very accomodating. The indoor pool was great. Great location fom the beach to the room. Thanks Bonita Beach. Tommy (redzone) Beach Lake, Pa

Reviews.Title: “Horrible, Horrible, Horrible!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: kyleigh10
Reviews.Content: When I arrived at the "HOTEL " the woman at the front desk must've either been extremely busy or just in a bad mood. She was very unprofessional and when I asked if everything was okay, she responded by telling me she was in no mood for sarcasm, called an older man from the back and yelled at him to "deal with me" or she would refund my deposit & give me directions back home. The older man was a little less hostile and gave me my room keys. However, when I got upstairs to my room, I decided to cancel my stay because the room was not at all how it looked online. The bed linen looked soiled & wrinkled, like it hadn't been changed or straigtened out. The toilet bowl was either rusty or just plain dirty. To be honest I was scared to allow my children to sit down in the room, I went back down to the lobby and made them sit on the beach furniture until I got my deposit refunded, by the older man, who was no longer nice & I found another Hotel to stay in for the weekend. I wouldn't recommend my dog stay at this "Hotel!!" This was the worst experience I have ever had, dealing with a place that is only in business because of money from tourists!!

Reviews.Title: “Surprise, Surprise, Surprise”
Reviews.Author: FrederickMaryland
Reviews.Content: Well, I have to say....We had a great experience at the Bonita. Nobody is more surprised than me. My family goes to Ocean City on a regular basis. We like to try different hotels. We often come off season and stay at some of the nicer hotels for less money. We typically like hotels that are ocean front or very close and with 2 children we like to have a pool. Inside pool in case of bad weather. There are a lot of hotels in OC. There are also a lot of dated and expensive hotels. Keep that in mind if you have not been there before. Let me list the nice things about Bonita...Indoor pool, close to beach, big, fairly new looking rooms, kitchenette in room and fitness room. The mid town location is nice ,too. My first visit to Bonita was great we were happy to have found an affordable nice hotel. No problems. Our second visit not quite the same. Our A/C didn't work and we had trouble getting it fixed, we could have lived with that. We decided not to come back to Bonita after having a "run in" with the "lady" at the front desk. Like the other reviews, she can be nasty. We said we would not go back. A couple of years have passed and we decided to try it again, we were leary after reading all the negative reviews. We figured, we would expect the worst and hope for the best. We got the best. We got there on Monday and were going to leave on Wednesday. I was trying to pick the place apart. I have to say, it was clean. The halls and room were very nice. The pool could have used a litlle tidy, but still ok. We had the nicest room we have had to date. If you get a room on the left side of the building, you have a pretty nice view of the bay and ocean. We added a day and stayed until Thursday. I am still reluctant to recommend this place, but we had a great time. The "lady" even suggested a new place for us to try for lunch. Keep an open mind. We have had more good than bad at Bonita. After our last trip, we would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “The rooms are huge”
Reviews.Author: CanadaKingsHill
Reviews.Content: Do not get wrong when you look at the hotel from outside. The reception area is small and not very impressed. But, the staff is friendly. The room is BIG with all neccessary amenties. not to mention the fridge is huge. Like it says on its website: it has just renovated. Things still look new and clean. The pool is builted impressively with sunny-glass above, so the water is warm. Price is reasonable. Recommended for family with young kids.

Reviews.Title: “The dirtiest rooms and worst customer service ever during my travels”
Reviews.Author: travelagentVa
Reviews.Content: (WARNING STAY AT YOUR OWN RISK) Upon arrival and checking into any hotel room the first thing I always check is for bathroom cleanliness, needless to say this one was far from that. The toilet was stained around the rim and looked like it had urine around the base which was totally ignored when or if cleaned by housekeeping. From there I ventured into the room were the two double beds were and notice while undressing the beds the linen did not smell fresh. I then checked the pillows on the bed and noticed that they were stained and needed to be replaced. I also notice within the room there were hand prints and dirt around adjoining room the door knobs. In morning before checking out while straightening up the bed I also notice that the base of each double bed there was dirt and paper left on the floor that was not vacuumed as expected this is unacceptable for a hotel that was charging over three hundred dollars a night. All of this information was passed on to the staff however it appeared to go into one ear and came out of the other. The lady at the front desk that is mentioned in several comments in other reviews was very unprofessional and refuses to listen to me when I tried to explain to her what I have found during my stay. I highly recommend that this hotel be investigated to see if it actually meets hotel standards for cleanliness and provides proper customer service to run a business of such. It appears that the owners are trying to hide something from there guest when questioned, very defensive and likes to argue with their guest. During my stay I had something missing and ask to speak with housekeeping and was denied stating that they did not find anything even without me talking to housekeeping to inform them of what was missing as possibly were to look. The lady at the front desk is running this hotel like it is some kind of concentration camp. NOTE: CUSTOMER SERVICE IS THE WORSE (LADY AT THE FRONT DESK) VERY UNCLEAN OLD LINEN AND SMELLS STAINED PILLOWS DIRTY CARPET DIRTY TOILET UNEXPERIENCED HOUSEKEEPING STAFF NEED CHANGE OF OWERSHIP VERY SMALL AND

Reviews.Title: “Poor representatives and management”
Reviews.Author: lynnie545
Reviews.Content: I had a reservation which I booked through Priceline. I arrived at Bonita Beach Hotel prior to check-in time on July 4th, 2008. Instead of looking up my name and confirming I was ready to be checked in, just not until 3:00 pm in the afternoon, the lady at the front desk looked at me with greeting and stated "3." (We were well aware of the check-in time, as we are frequent travelers. Additionally, the representative had behind her each reservation due to check in that day). Around check-in time the hotel allowed my party and I to check-in. Not finding our reservations, we provided them with our Priceline confirmation. The hotel refused to honor our confirmation. The hotel stated that they never received complete information from Priceline, preventing them to submit a reservation. Priceline and the Bonita Beach hotel communicated via phone twice - each company claimed innocence. The Bonita Beach Hotel representative stated there was one, three night room available (Our reservation was for two nights). However, once Priceline contacted Bonita Beach Hotel to discuss our situation, the representative quickly stated there were no more vacancies and refused our reservation. The representative stated she was aware my party and I had a confirmation. She stated she recognized my Priceline confirmation. She additionally provided us briefly with the Priceline reservation form submitted May 26th, when we initially booked our reservation through www.priceline.com. But the Bonita Beach representative stated she would not honor our reservation. This was July 4th, 2008, at almost 3:30 in the afternoon. Finding a hotel at that time in Ocean City, Maryland is unlikely, and if it does happen, expect to pay a higher than normal price. Bonita Beach Hotel, the particular woman who worked that afternoon, as well as the hotel manager who is a male, older man, also working that afternoon, were impolite, not helpful, and showed no concern. My party and I were in the hotel lobby for a good hour and though the staff was ruder to us than anyone else that came in, they clearly displayed unprofessionalism, a lack of customer service, and a lack of care for their customers, both actual and potential. I never did stay at Bonita Beach Hotel. By the time my party and I left there, we felt good about not investing our weekend with an inconsiderate staff such as was experienced. I do not recommend their hotel if you are looking for a friendly staff with, even less than amateur, customer service.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Okay but could use some improvements.”
Reviews.Author: LJKMaryland
Reviews.Content: My family and I just returned from this hotel, we went for fathers day weekend. The hotel overall was great but they definately need a new maid service. The front desk had my keys and everything ready upon my arrival and was very professional. When we left out on saturday and returned I would have never known anyone had came in the room except when I saw that they replaced the towels and facerags. The beds were not made properly and nothing was touched and therefore nothing was cleaned. When we left back out out we saw the cleaning people going to clean a room they happened to be teenagers and that explains why the room was not cleaned properly. The stay was great but the cleaning is an important factor and if they wish for me and my family to stay here again they need to invest in people who want to clean.

Reviews.Title: “Not recommended”
Reviews.Author: pink29_8
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this place to anyone. First they were sand plasting the pool next door until 8:30 PM. It was so loud you could barely here the TV. At each end of the corridor the in wall heaters were torn out and the walls badly damaged. Carpet was not vaccumed. There was only a 1/2 roll of toilet paper in the bathroom, One of the kitchen cabinet hinges was missing and the door fell off when I opened it. Bed was uncomfortable. The volume on the TV would only go up half way and with the noise from the sand blasting we couldn't here it. I had to turn the hot water up full and it was only luke warm. They next morning it nearly burnt me. The whole place seemed musty and worn out. Never going back!!

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice”
Reviews.Author: dawn011
Reviews.Content: The rooms are fairly large. We had a family of 4 in the room with 2 queen beds + a sleeper sofa. We had plenty of room. The hotel is very close to everything and the ocean is just a VERY short walk. You don't even have to cross the street. We could see the bay and the ocean from our balcony. It is not an ocean front view but we could still see the waves crashing on the shore. The room was very clean. The only down side is the beds were a little hard for my taste. My family however, had no issues with the beds. The pool was awesome and my 9 year old loved it. I would say this is a great hotel for the price. We would stay here again. The staff was very nice.

Reviews.Title: “Beware of the Bonita”
Reviews.Author: love94
Reviews.Content: Called on March 27, 2008 It all started by calling the hotel to get information about it's amenities, I was told that it was the newest hotel on the beach, and it was beautiful. They told me that from my balcony it would be a beautiful view of the ocean. They stated that they had a heated pool and a fitness room, and jumped immedeiatly into asking me which card would I be using? After allowing them to charge my card, then he replied You're pass the cancelation period so you must show up and there will not be any refund for not showing up. My day began as follows: Checked in March 29, 2008. Walked into the hotel, their were two mexican women sitting in the lobby, looking funny-eyed at me. The reason why they looked at me all funny-eyed, because I was the second one coming into the hotel. I walked to the front desk surprisingly no one was there. I kindly said hello really loud.After that a man came out with his dog, a cute one I might add. He greeted me as though the hotel was jumping. After checking my credit card information, I found out that he had overcharged me, but we got that straight. I started questioning him about the pool. He stated that the pool was cool, because the heater stopped working. He stated that the Tech would be there in the morning. That was the 29th. After that he gave me my keys and I kindly took my things to my room. Once I entered the room, I started checking everything. The bathroom did not look clean to me. The freezer had food particles in it including a "BIG FAT GRAPE" and I don't mean pretty hot and tempting. My balcony door was open. When I walked outside for the ocean view, to my surprise I saw another hotel. In order to see the ocean view, I had to bend my neck like donkey on Shrek. The first night I decied to take my chances on swimming because I am a water-baby, of course the pool was cold and the hallway was cold. The second night was the same. I called for some coffee because it was so cold, the heat barely worked. The gentlemen told me to come and get it. He only wanted to give me one small package. I had to beg for another one. To top that off, he was drunker than the man on In Living Color. He stated he drinks whisky and some other drink. While he was talking I was pushing the elevator button. The third night I just couldn't take it any more. I had to get away from that hotel some way. So while I was driving down the road looking for a nice place to eat, God allowed me to see the Carousel Resort Hotel, which was my first choice in the beginning. I went in to look at the rooms, and they were nice, and you know I went to the pool room, and it was awesome. The pool was heated to 89 and the whirlpool was heated to 101. I had to pay 5 dollars to use their pool. I have no complaints. The amenities there were awesome.To make a long story short, the pool was never serviced. My room was never cleaned, and one more thing, and there was never any one avalible at the front desk. It was like going into the hotel called The Shining. My whole stay I only saw one couple in the pool and I never saw them again. I am a minister and I believe in truth. I lovingly warn you not to stay at The Bonita Beach Hotel, if you do, don't charge in advance.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Stay”
Reviews.Author: jcrabs
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews and was a bit nervous. I was pleasantly surprised. Our room was clean and enough room for our family. We had a nice balcony view and the children loved the indoor pool. The hallways, pool area and the exercise room were clean. The staff was very friendly and I didn't hear the neighbors on either side. One of the families had small children and I expected alot of noise. We had two queen size beds and a pullout sofa, a fridge and microwave. We really enjoyed our stay and will return again and again.

Reviews.Title: “We will stay again”
Reviews.Author: maddie622
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful time at the Bonita Beach Hotel. Our room was spacious and equipped with a full size refrigerator, sink, microwave, coffee maker and dishes. The rooms were very clean and I have no complaints about the maid service-they even cleaned our dishes which was unexpected! I'd have to say that the Bonita Beach is perfect if your looking for a clean place to stay for a few nights. I also thought the price was reasonable, but again, we stayed there in September during the off season.

Reviews.Title: “spacious”
Reviews.Author: bunbun771
Reviews.Content: The amount of space in that room was amazing. We had 2 queen beds plus a pull out sofa bed, not to mention a patio and a kitchenette with a full size fridge and dishes. The room was clean except for som trash left behind the night stand by a former guest (guess housekeeping doesn't look behind the furniture). I did think that housekeeping was a little slow in room cleaning, we went out and the room still hadn't been cleaned by the time we got back and it was after lunch. Other than that it was good and Pino's Pizza across the street-- whoa the best pizza I've had in a long time. The indoor pool area was clean and didn't go beyond 4ft which I thought was good for kids. I would definitely stay ther again. K.C.,washington,dc.

Reviews.Title: “Pretty nice for OC”
Reviews.Author: kidsandtravel
Reviews.Content: Aesthetically this hotel is quite pleasing, given that many ocean city hotels which are far more expensive, look terrible. The room was clean, the carpet and upholstery looked in good condition . It is competitively priced and conveniently located. The staff were helpful and courteous. The rooms are a great size, two queen beds and pull out sleep sofa. We had 2 adults and 4 kids, plenty of room. Cable TV a plus with kids. Thats the good stuff out of the way. The negatives, I had very little sleep, thanks to the ridiculously loud air conditioning, every time it would come on it fired up like and old furnace, had it just stayed on it wouldn't have been so bad. I preferred the AC noise on as when it went off all could hear was the couple in the next room arguing. The walls are so dreadfully pathetic, I could hear every word. When people are in the hallways it is noisy, but other than the domestic next to me it wasn't a particularly noisy hotel. There are some rooms that open up onto a big hallway seating area, I think on level 2 and 3. I can imagine those getting noisy if people are hanging out there. Warning to parents of young kids. Our patio door to the balcony did not lock, which im sure is a code violation. We had to be extra vigilant that one of the kids did not slip out there. We didn't have a problem but they do have some parking restrictions when they are fully booked, only 1 car per room. Would I stay here again???? I probably would, but will wear ear plugs next time:-)

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: jra500
Reviews.Content: The Bonita Beach hotel is a great place to stay! I was a little nervous after reading some other reviews, but was very happy with our stay there last week. It was a big "step up" from other "beach" hotels we have stayed at. Other reviews mentioned thin walls and constant noise but we noticed very little of that. I think whether you stay at a one star or a four star hotel the distractions depend on the people in the rooms on either side of you or right above you. We stayed 6 nights and I can only remember two times where I heard anything from surrounding rooms. The pool was small but well stocked with towels and very clean. Most of the parking lot was covered so the car remained cool despite the hot temps! Our balcony had a nice partial view of the ocean. Overall our stay was great. There are only two slight negatives about our stay. The air conditioner was extremely noisy! It actually woke us up a few times in the middle of the night. The other negative is that there are really not many restaurants within a short walking distance. There is a take out pizza shop and a high end restaurant right across the street but really no family places nearby. You have to walk (or get in the car and drive) about 8-12 blocks to find a place for the family to eat. While I don't mind a nice walk, after a long day in the sun and a big meal I don't want to have a 12 block walk back from dinner.

Reviews.Title: “Great Time despite questionable reviews . . .”
Reviews.Author: The51Crew
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews for this hotel from the various e-spots and had my concerns; but said hey, everyone has a bad day; so I will give them a try. Any issues that I may have had with our room, I made the front desk aware and it was addressed immediately. My children and I loved the hotel pool and it's convienent location to the beach and the Ocean City activities. It is nestled in a quieter area of the beach; however drunk teenagers travel well and may find their way to any area of the beach. I strongly recommend the Anglier Restaurant's cruise which is free with your dinner; it was excellent and so was the food!!!

Reviews.Title: “More of a motel than a hotel”
Reviews.Author: NYBarbaraR
Reviews.Content: We found the Bonita Beach Hotel to be more like a motel than a hotel during our 5-night stay in late June. With that said, as a beach motel, it was fine. Our room was large, clean, and quiet. The king-sized bed was comfortable. The bathroom had energy-saver lights that took a few minutes to get going, but we quickly got used to them. The shower worked fine and there was always hot water. The room had a large refrigerator/freezer, a microwave, a small coffee maker, and a full sink. We had no issues with having our room cleaned, but we always made sure to hang the “service please” sign on our door each morning when we left for the beach based on the comments of other reviewers. Overall, the staff members seemed nice enough and were responsive to any questions we had. It was an easy walk from the hotel to the beach and to nearby restaurants and stores. (If you like reading on the beach, there’s a neat little paperback exchange bookstore just a few doors away). We had no interest in using the enclosed pool area, but we took a look just to check it out. It seemed kind of hot and stuffy, so it might be a better option during the colder months. The pictures on the Web site make the hotel look much more glamorous than it actually is. If you’re looking for fluffy towels and pampering, this is not the hotel for you. But if you want a clean, comfortable home-base while you enjoy the beach and the Ocean City scene, the Bonita Beach Hotel is a good choice.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience”
Reviews.Author: Zellifer
Reviews.Content: Bonita Beach staff was friendly and the rooms were far better than the sand filled hotels that I have stayed in at the beach. Clean and new rooms. While previous reviews cited housekeeping as an issue, we found the hotel to be immaculate. We had a maintenance issue with our room and notified the front desk. Upon check out, we were refunded a portion of our stay for what I would consider a relatively small issue. Staff was friendly and helpful. Location was great with bay and ocean views; short walk to beach. Easy to take the $2 bus to boardwalk. Only complaint was thin walls--sounded like a honeymoon was going on in the room next door.

Reviews.Title: “Unsafe stay”
Reviews.Author: ddo21122
